org.zaproxy.zap.utils
Class ViewState

java.lang.Object
  org.zaproxy.zap.utils.ViewState

public class ViewState
extends java.lang.Object

THIS CODE IS FROM THE PROJECT LOCATED AT http://code.google.com/p/embeddednode/ AND THE RIGHT HAS BEEN GRANTED BY HIS OWNED TO BE USED WITHIN THE ZAP PROJECT

Make a implemented java.io.Serializable object to encode base64 string and vice versa.

For example: [code] public static void main(String[] argv) { class Bicycle implements Serializable { String manufacturer; float price; byte level; Bicycle(String manufacturer, float price, byte level) { this.price = price; this.manufacturer = manufacturer; this.level = level; } } String base64 = ViewState.encode(new Bicycle("Giant", (float)0x000000FF, (byte)0x0000000A)); //encode Bicycle bicycle = ViewState.decode(base64); //decode } [/code]

Version:
1.2 June 10, 2009
Author:
embeddednode
